name: distinguishably
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is different or separate from other things or people and that is easy to notice or understand: distinguishably different In terms of students completing their courses, Language Studies was not distinguishably different from other more established courses. Our results show that this species was distinguishably the most effective seed dispersal agent.
More examplesFewer examplesThe course consists of units that are distinguishably separate.There are two distinguishably different factors to be noted here. Students graduating from a university with a slightly lower average grade are not distinguishably different.
